info.title: iManage Work for Admins
info.description: iManage Work for Admins connector enables administrators to automate their repetitive or integration tasks, such as adding users or updating custom fields.

get.description: Gets the list of user roles for a library.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the target library.

parameters.name: is_external
parameters.description: Specifies the library roles returned are external roles.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Specifies the unique ID of the user, overriding the is_external query parameter to return possible roles that can be assigned to the user.

data.description: Indicates the list of user roles for a library.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the role.

description.title: Description
description.description: Indicates the description of the role.

get.description: Gets a list of libraries to which the user has access.

id.title: Library ID
id.description: Indicates the name of the library.

display_name.title: Library Name
display_name.description: Indicates the display name of the library.

type.title: Library Type
type.description: Indicates the type of the library. Possible values are 'worksite' or 'linksite'.

is_hidden.title: Is Hidden Library
is_hidden.description: Indicates if the library is hidden.

get.description: Gets a list of lookup field names.

id.title: Lookup Field ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the lookup field.

display_name.title: Lookup Field Name
display_name.description: Indicates the display name of the lookup field.

get.summary: Get schema for create custom or property lookup
get.description: Gets the dynamic schema for CreateCustomOrPropertyLookup action.

parameters.name: lookupFieldId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the lookup field.

get.description: Gets a list of lookup aliases for the specified lookup field ID.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the target library.

parameters.name: parentAlias
parameters.description: Specifies the parent of the custom property alias if custom2 or custom30 is selected.

parameters.name: getParentAliases
parameters.description: Specifies to get aliases of the parent field or child field. Only applicable for custom2 and custom30.

data.description: indicates the list of lookup aliases for the specified lookup field ID.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the lookup alias.

description.title: Name
description.description: Indicates the name of the lookup alias.

post.summary: Create alias for custom or property lookup
post.description: Creates a custom property alias for custom1 through custom12, custom29, and custom30.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the ID of the target library.

get.description: Gets the schema for the create user password operation.

post.description: Creates user and assigns the user to the preferred library.

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: Specifies the full name of the user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Specifies the unique ID of the user. Other than whitespace, you can use any alphanumeric value and the special characters *().&-_[]`~|@$%^?:{}!',/\#+<>;"=.

email.title: Email
email.description: Specifies the email address of the user. For example, 'email1234@ajubalaw.com'.

is_external.title: External User
is_external.description: Specifies if the user is an external user.

preferred_library.title: Preferred Library
preferred_library.description: Specifies the preferred (default) library. Each user must have one preferred library.

role.title: Role
role.description: Specifies the role of the user in a library.

ignore_if_user_already_exists.title: Ignore If User Already Exists
ignore_if_user_already_exists.description: Specifies if the user's info is returned if the user already exists or to return a duplicate record error.

password_create_method.title: Password Creation Options
password_create_method.description: Specifies to create a password directly or to send an email to the user.

id.title: User ID
id.description: Indicates the unique ID of the user.

user_nos.title: User NOS
user_nos.description: Indicates the user's type. The user type can be virtual (2) or enterprise (6).

user_id_ex.title: Extended User ID
user_id_ex.description: Indicates the original value of the user ID that is received from the source system such as Active Directory.

ssid.title: User SSID
ssid.description: Indicates the unique, system-generated ID of the user.

pwd_never_expire.title: Password Never Expires
pwd_never_expire.description: Indicates if the user's password never expires.

is_locked.title: Is Locked
is_locked.description: Indicates if the user is locked.

is_external.title: External User
is_external.description: Indicates if the user is an external user.

has_password.title: Has Password
has_password.description: Indicates if the user has a password.

force_password_change.title: Force Password Change
force_password_change.description: Indicates the user must change their password on next logon. Only applicable to virtual users, indicated by User NOS with value '2'.

failed_logins.title: Failed Logons
failed_logins.description: Indicates the current number of failed logon attempts of the user.

email.title: User Email
email.description: Indicates the email address of the user.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the user profile.

create_date.title: Create Date
create_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the user was created.

pwd_changed_ts.title: Password Changed Date
pwd_changed_ts.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) the user's password was changed.

allow_logon.title: Allow Logon
allow_logon.description: Indicates if the user is allowed to logon.

user_created.title: User Created
user_created.description: Indicates if the user was created successfully. If `true`, a new user was created successfully. If `false`, the user already existed.

post.description: Assigns an existing user to a library.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the ID of the target library.

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: Specifies the name of the user to be assigned to target library.

role.title: Role
role.description: Specifies the role of the user in the target library.

is_preferred_library.title: Is Preferred Library
is_preferred_library.description: Specifies to set library ID as the user's preferred library.

post.description: Adds a new folder under a workspace, tab or folder.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the folder.

parentId.title: Parent ID
parentId.description: Specifies the ID of the target workspace or folder. An example of a folder or workspace ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

parentType.title: Parent Type
parentType.description: Specifies the type of the target folder's parent.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Specifies the default security for the folder.

description.title: Description
description.description: Specifies the description of the folder.

email.title: Email
email.description: Specifies the unique prefix for the email address of the folder. For 'Enter custom value' option, acceptable characters are letters, numbers, and period(.), underscore(_), dash(-).

owner.title: Folder Owner
owner.description: Specifies the user ID for the owner of the folder. An example user ID is 'ACASE'.

class.title: Class
class.description: Specifies the class of the folder.

subclass.title: Subclass
subclass.description: Specifies the subclass of the folder.

is_external_as_normal.title: External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Specifies if an external user has the same security access level as a normal user for public folders.

inherit_profile_from_workspace.title: Inherit All Custom Values From Workspace
inherit_profile_from_workspace.description: Specifies if the new folder inherits all custom property values from the workspace. If 'No' is specified, you can inherit some custom values, as stated in the description for each.

post.description: Adds a new tab under a workspace.

name.title: Name
name.description: Specifies the name of the tab.

parentId.title: Parent Workspace ID
parentId.description: Specifies the ID of the target workspace. An example of a workspace ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Specifies the default security for the tab.

description.title: Description
description.description: Specifies the description of the tab.

owner.title: Tab Owner
owner.description: Specifies the user ID for the owner of the tab. An example user ID is 'ACASE'.

get.description: Get email address options for the folder.
Gets a schema for adding folder properties.

parameters.name: inherit_profile_from_workspace
parameters.x-ms-summary: Inherit profile values from parent workspace

get.description: Gets categories created in 'My Matters'. Administrators can specify a user ID to get 'My Matters' categories for that user.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Specifies the user ID of the 'My Matters' owner.

200.description: List of categories under My Matters.

category_type.title: Type
category_type.description: Indicates the category type. Possible values are 'my_matters', 'my_favorites'.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level for the category. Possible values are 'inherit', 'public', 'view', 'private'.

has_subfolders.title: Has Sub-folders
has_subfolders.description: Indicates if the category has subfolders. A subfolder can be a workspace, folder, or category.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the category. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!987'.

name.title: Name
name.description: Indicates the name of the category.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Indicates the user ID of the category owner.

post.summary: Add shortcuts to user's My Matters
post.description: Adds workspace shortcuts to a user's 'My Matters'. If a Category ID is specified, shortcuts are placed under that category.

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: Specifies the ID of the 'My Matters' owner.

workspace_id.title: Workspace ID
workspace_id.description: Specifies one or more workspace IDs, separated by a semicolon. An example of a workspace ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

category_id.title: Category ID
category_id.description: Specifies the ID of the category under 'My Matters'. An example of a category ID is 'ACTIVE_US!123'.

shortcuts.title: Workspace Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Indicates a collection of workspace shortcuts added to 'My Matters'.

all_workspace_shortcut_ids.title: All Workspace Shortcut IDs
all_workspace_shortcut_ids.description: Indicates a list of all workspace shortcut IDs, concatenated as a string and separated by semicolons.

get.description: Gets a schema for updating custom fields.

parameters.name: lookupFieldId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the lookup field.

post.description: Updates a custom field description or enabled state for custom1 through custom12, custom29, and custom30.

libraryId.title: Library ID
libraryId.description: Specifies the ID of the target library.

database.title: Database
database.description: Indicates the library where the folder is located.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level for the folder. Possible values are 'public', 'view', 'private', 'inherited'.

description.title: Folder Description
description.description: Indicates any additional information about the folder. This property is returned only if a description is set for the folder.

edit_date.title: Folder Edit Date
edit_date.description: Indicates the date and time (in ISO 8601 format) of the most recent change to the folder profile or its contents.

effective_security.title: Folder Effective Security
effective_security.description: Indicates the effective security access level for the folder. Possible values are 'full_access', 'read_write', 'read', 'no_access'.

email.title: Folder Email
email.description: Indicates the email address of the folder.

folder_type.title: Folder Type
folder_type.description: Indicates the type of the folder. Possible values are 'regular', 'search', 'tab', 'category', 'my_matters', 'my_favorites'.

folder_url.title: Folder URL
folder_url.description: Indicates the sharable link for the folder.

has_documents.title: Has Documents
has_documents.description: Indicates if the folder has documents.

has_subfolders.title: Has Sub-folders
has_subfolders.description: Indicates if the folder has other folders under it.

id.title: Folder ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the folder.

inherited_default_security.title: Inherited Default Security
inherited_default_security.description: Indicates the default access permission assigned to an iManage Work object that is inherited from its parent container. This field is present only if 'default_security' is 'inherit'. Possible values are 'private', 'public', 'view'.

is_container_saved_search.title: Container Saved Search
is_container_saved_search.description: Indicates if folder search is saved in this folder.

is_content_saved_search.title: Is Content Saved Search
is_content_saved_search.description: Indicates document search is saved in this folder.

is_external.title: Is External Folder
is_external.description: Indicates if the folder is shared with external users.

is_external_as_normal.title: External As Normal
is_external_as_normal.description: Indicates if an external user has the same security access level as a normal user for public folders.

name.title: Folder Name
name.description: Indicates the name of the folder.

owner.title: Folder Owner
owner.description: Indicates the user ID for the owner of the folder.

owner_description.title: Folder Owner Description
owner_description.description: Indicates additional information about the folder owner.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicates the class of the folder.

subclass.title: Subclass
subclass.description: Indicates the subclass of the folder.

custom21.title: Custom21
custom21.description: Indicates the value of custom21 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom22.title: Custom22
custom22.description: Indicates the value of custom22 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom23.title: Custom23
custom23.description: Indicates the value of custom23 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

custom24.title: Custom24
custom24.description: Indicates the value of custom24 in ISO 8601 datetime format.

parent_id.title: Parent ID
parent_id.description: Indicates the ID of the parent folder.

view_type.title: View Type
view_type.description: Indicates the folder view type based on its content. Possible values are 'none', 'document', 'email', 'email_search', 'document_search', 'linksite', 'imanage_share'.

workspace_id.title: Workspace ID
workspace_id.description: Indicates the ID of the parent workspace.

workspace_name.title: Workspace Name
workspace_name.description: Indicates the name of the parent workspace.

wstype.title: Library Type
wstype.description: Indicates the iManage Work type of the object. Possible values are 'folder', 'workspace', 'folder_shortcut', 'workspace_shortcut'.

database.title: Database
database.description: Indicates the library where the tab is located.

default_security.title: Default Security
default_security.description: Indicates the default security access level for the tab. Possible values are 'public', 'view', 'private', 'inherited'.

description.title: Tab Description
description.description: Indicates any additional information about the tab. This property is returned only if a description is set for the folder.

id.title: Tab ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the tab.

name.title: Tab Name
name.description: Indicates the name of the tab.

owner.title: Tab Owner
owner.description: Indicates the user ID for the owner of the tab.

owner_description.title: Tab Owner Description
owner_description.description: Indicates additional information about the tab owner.

tab_url.title: Tab URL
tab_url.description: Indicates the sharable link for the tab.

workspace_id.title: Workspace ID
workspace_id.description: Indicates the ID of the parent workspace.

workspace_name.title: Workspace Name
workspace_name.description: Indicates the name of the parent workspace.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the ID of the shortcut. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!987'.

wstype.title: Wstype
wstype.description: Indicates the iManage Work type of the object. Possible value is 'workspace_shortcut'.

id.title: ID
id.description: Indicates the target workspace ID for the shortcut. For example, 'ACTIVE_US!987'.
